column1: I love this phone! The battery lasts so long and the camera is amazing.
This product is terrible. It broke within a week.
Good value for money. The performance is excellent.
Customer service was very unhelpful. Had a lot of issues with my order.
I think the product could be improved by making it more durable.
The delivery was super fast! Very happy with my purchase.
The screen keeps freezing, and I can't even use the apps properly.
Would definitely recommend this to my friends! Great quality.
Not worth the price. Expected better performance.
The packaging was damaged, but the product itself was fine.
